Articles.Content: Curious if crew stats affect anything at this point or if they're completely meaningless. Also, does the game track experience anywhere? Show # of flights or have a change in status in any way? I noticed when I hired a new kerbal that his suit was a different color but couldn't find any other indication that he was different.

Only thing I can really tell you is, the suit color shows the Kerbals experience which is why Jeb, Bill and Bob have orange suits to show they are veterns. I'm guessing that if you can land a Kerbal many times safely (probably later in career mode) his suit will change to orange as well.

Maybe even we will get a new suit in career mode meaning legendary for example? Something to think about.
